\u2022 A good summary gives the appropriate information so that a person starts reading.
\u2022 Helping other writers, reading and discussing about books helps readers find you.
\u2022 Professionals promoting books can guarantee a degree of discoverability.
\u2022 A good cover attracts a reader\'s attention and gives them an idea about the novel.
\u2022 An editor can make your writing look professional and save you time editing on your own.
\u2022 Editing your book multiple times helps you improve as a writer and minimizes mistakes.
\u2022 Correct punctuation is a prerequisite for a professional writer and makes reading easier.
\u2022 Writing frequently helps you improve and maintain your interest in finishing a book.
\u2022 Aim for a good degree of research for your novel to be informed, inspired and focused.
\u2022 Stereotypes to be avoided can often be subconscious and considered as \"common sense\".
\u2022 Writing something out of the ordinary makes your story interesting and helps it stand out.
\u2022 When writing becomes a need, it\'s an extra motivation to keep writing and improve.
\u2022 A good flow from one sentence to another helps readers immerse themselves in the story.
\u2022 The absence of plot holes makes readers appreciate the novel and identify with the characters.
\u2022 Liveliness of the scenes and dialogues makes the story more interesting and realistic.
